trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw this elongated light moving not too very fast almost straight overhead moving north to south in the daytime in a clear blue sky. I had my camera with me and took two shots of it within 10 to 15 seconds of each other. I am attaching the first original shot and an enlargement of it. I am also attaching the enlargement of the second shot. I tried to take a third shot but the object had disappeared. There is not room here to attach the original of the second shot although a MUFON investigator has it for reference.
Summary: Light in daytime sky moving north to south
